str2: Wherefore, on which account, therefore. From dia and hos; through which thing, i.e. Consequently.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I am awake (in the night), watch, (b) I am watchful, on the alert, vigilant. From egeiro; to keep awake, i.e. Watch.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From a derivative of mneme; to exercise memory, i.e. Recollect; by implication, to punish; also to rehearse.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
A space of three years. From a compound of treis and etos; a three years' period.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to stop, i.e. Restrain, quit, desist, come to an end.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To admonish, warn, counsel, exhort. From the same as nouthesia; to put in mind, i.e. to caution or reprove gently.
Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
The night, night-time. A primary word; 'night'.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
A tear. Or dakruon dak'-roo-on; of uncertain affinity; a tear.
